View Javadoc
1   package com.test.vendor.firebird;
2   
3   import com.test.AbstractTestSuite;
4   import org.hibernate.cfg.JdbcSettings;
5   import spring.SpringApp;
6   
7   public abstract class ConcreteFirebirdSuiteIT extends AbstractTestSuite {
8   
9       public ConcreteFirebirdSuiteIT() {
10  
11          this.jdbcURL = SpringApp.propsFirebird.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_URL);
12          this.jdbcUser = SpringApp.propsFirebird.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_USER);
13          this.jdbcPass = SpringApp.propsFirebird.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_PASSWORD);
14  
15          this.jsqlDatabaseName = "ADMIN";
16          this.jsqlTableName = "STUDENT";
17          this.jsqlColumnName = "FIRST_NAME";
18          
19          this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName = "rdb$get_context";
20          this.jdbcColumnForTableName = "trim";  // prevent tabulation
21          this.jdbcColumnForColumnName = "trim";  // prevent tabulation
22          
23          this.jdbcQueryForDatabaseNames = "select rdb$get_context('SYSTEM', 'DB_NAME') from rdb$database";
24          this.jdbcQueryForTableNames = "select trim(rdb$relation_name) from rdb$relations";
25          this.jdbcQueryForColumnNames = "select trim(rdb$field_name) from rdb$relation_fields where rdb$relation_name = '"+ this.jsqlTableName +"'";
26          this.jdbcQueryForValues = "select "+ this.jsqlColumnName +" from "+ this.jsqlTableName;
27      }
28  }
